definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: I am a therapist at columbia-presbyterian.
sentences.chinese: 我在哥伦比亚的长老派教会医院当医师。

sentences.english: Van belonging to the large old-style coach.
sentences.chinese: 大范甘迪属于老派风格的主教练。

sentences.english: That's certainly an alternative to boring old modernism.
sentences.chinese: 那当然是一种厌恶老派现代的选择。

sentences.english: A great way to break up the classic black party dress is to add shine.
sentences.chinese: 打破老派黑色派对装魔咒的一大法宝就是增加闪光点。

sentences.english: Challenge yourself in this addictive, easy to use, old-school arcade racing game.
sentences.chinese: 挑战自己，在此上瘾，容易使用，老派街机赛车游戏。

sentences.english: which is a really old-fashioned cinema, and they show alternative films.
sentences.chinese: 是一个老派的电影院，他们放映不同的电影。

sentences.english: Perhaps they overdid it. Germany benefits from an old-fashioned structure.
sentences.chinese: 德国则从老派的经济结构中获益良多。

sentences.english: The son of a successful actor of the old school, he knew the theatre from early childhood on.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个老派成名演员的儿子，从小熟悉演剧。
在老派风格的回合制战斗。

sentences.english: Besides, some of the old style Satanists tended, in fact, to be quite nice people.
sentences.chinese: 而且，事实上，老派的撒旦教徒大多都是相当不错的。

sentences.english: This year's winners could hardly be geekier.
sentences.chinese: 今年的获奖者不可能更老派了。

sentences.english: Conditional parenting isn't limited to old-school authoritarians.
sentences.chinese: 不仅老派专制的家长会使用条件养育法。

definition: way of doing sth/behavior/to act in an affected manner/mannerism/gestures in opera
to rebel against orthodoxy/to depart from established practices
